objects.specification: A flat sturdy floor surface with an earthy brown tone reminiscent of prehistoric soil, featuring a smooth matte finish and subtle wood grain texture to evoke warmth and durability.

An expansive dinosaur-themed wall mural depicting a variety of prehistoric creatures in lifelike poses, rendered in rich earthy colors, covering much of the side wall for an immersive effect.
A large rectangular window with a light frame and clear glass panes, allowing ample natural light, accented by simple hardware for a clean look.
Soft fabric curtains in an earthy green tone, with gentle folds and subtle texture, framing the window and enhancing the prehistoric color palette.
A circular wall clock with a simple frame and clear numbering, featuring minimalist hands and a matte finish to blend with the classroom theme.
A mounted dinosaur skeleton replica with bone-like texture and realistic anatomical detail, displayed above floor level to showcase prehistoric structure.
A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple shelves filled with dinosaur-related books, featuring a warm wood grain finish and sturdy vertical supports.
